branchCategory.name: VT
branchCategory.description: <p>Series VT 3 port, direct operated poppet valves are compact in size, yet provide large flow capacity, and low power consumption.&nbsp; The series is suitable for use in vacuum applications.&nbsp; The VT valve is a single valve with 6 functions (universal porting type) such as N.C. valve, N.O. valve, divider valve, selector valve, etc.&nbsp; The manifold style valve, series VO, can be easily converted from N.C. (normally closed) to N.O. (normally open) by merely turning over the switch cover.</p> <p>&nbsp;</p>

branchItem.name: Valve (All Types)

(normally closed) to N.O. (normally open) by merely turning over the switch cover.</p> <p>&nbsp;</p>
